meanings.definition: Resembling a rabbit in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy toy had a rabbity look with its long ears and soft fur.
meanings.sent2: The bunny's rabbity hops delighted the children at the petting zoo.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat had a rabbity surprise inside - a bunch of carrots!
meanings.sent4: Her quick, rabbity movements on the dance floor amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with rabbity creatures, hopping and nibbling on grass.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of or relating to rabbits.
meanings.sent1: The rabbity behavior of the pet rabbit made it a favorite among the family.
meanings.sent2: The rabbity features of the new rabbit breed were admired by breeders.
meanings.sent3: The rabbity party decorations included carrot-shaped balloons and bunny banners.
meanings.sent4: Her rabbity instincts kicked in as she carefully sniffed the fresh garden vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The rabbity nature of the burrow made it a cozy home for the rabbit family.
